fields.name: ant
fields.comments:
Antenna code. 
Use 0 for a custom pattern with fields defined by hbw,vbw,fbr. 
See https://cloudrf.com/API/antennas/

fields.name: area_coverage_endpoint
fields.comments: POST Area Coverage (Point-to-Multipoint)

fields.name: azi
fields.comments: Antenna azimuth, grid north, degrees.

fields.name: ber
fields.comments:
Bit Error Rate (For mode out=4 only). 
Numbers 1-6 are generic. 
7-12 are LoRa spreading factors. 
1=0.1, 
2=0.01, 
3=0.001,
4=0.0001,
5=0.00001,
6=0.000001. 
7=SF7,
8=SF8,
9=SF9,
10=SF10,
11=SF11,
12=SF12

fields.name: blu
fields.comments: Blue threshold. For use with custom RGB schema only

fields.name: bwi
fields.comments:
Bandwidth in MHz. 
1MHz has a noise floor of -114dBm. 
10MHz = -104dBm, 20MHz = -101dBm

fields.name: clh
fields.comments:
Random clutter height. 
For use only with res=90 DEM

fields.name: cli
fields.comments:
Radio climate.
1: Equatorial (Congo) 
2: Continental Subtropical (Sudan) 
3: Maritime Subtropical (West coast of Africa) 
4: Desert (Sahara) 
5: Continental Temperate 
6: Maritime Temperate, over land (UK and west coasts of US & EU) 
7: Maritime Temperate, over sea

fields.name: cll
fields.comments: Land cover toggle. Enriches hard DSM and LIDAR terrain data with permeable materials like trees. If used in a city will constrain coverage substantially.

fields.name: col
fields.comments:
Colour schema code. 
1 = Cellular (5), 
2=Red, 
3=Green, 
4=Blue, 
5=Microwave(7), 
7=Custom RGB, 
8=Automatic by frequency, 
10=Rainbow(24), 
11=Green/Blue/Red, 
13=Sub noise floor (10), 
14=TV broadcasting (4).
Any value greater than 32 will be interpreted as a Hexadecimal RGB colour eg. 65535 = 0x00FFFF or RGB(0,255,255)

fields.name: del_calculation_endpoint
fields.comments: Delete calculation endpoint

fields.name: dis
fields.comments:
Distance units. 
m = metres/km,
f = feet/Mi

fields.name: engine
fields.comments: Propagation engine. 1=Signal server (Original open source engine, 4 cores). 2=SLEIPNIR (New engine with LOS built in to every model, 8 cores)

fields.name: fbr
fields.comments: Front to back ratio in dB. For use only with custom antenna code 0.

fields.name: grn
fields.comments: Green threshold. For use only with custom RGB schema.

fields.name: hbw
fields.comments: Horizontal beamwidth. For use only with pattern 0

fields.name: ked
fields.comments: Knife edge diffraction. Enhances basic propagation models other than 1 (ITM).

fields.name: key
fields.comments: Unique API key. Login to see yours at https://cloudrf.com/

fields.name: mesh_site_endpoint
fields.comments: POST Mesh sites (Super layer)

fields.name: mod
fields.comments:
Modulation code for Bit Error Rate mode. 
1=4QAM,
2=16QAM,
3=64QAM,
4=256QAM,
5=1024QAM,
6=BPSK,
7=QPSK,
8=8PSK,
9=16PSK,
10=32PSK,
11=LoRa

fields.name: nf
fields.comments: Noise floor. Should be between -120 and -90 normally and varies with bandwidth so 1MHz has a noise floor of -114dBm. 10MHz = -104dBm, 20MHz = -101dBm

fields.name: out
fields.comments:
Measurement units. 
1 = dB, 
2=dBm (default), 
3=dBuV/m, 
4=BER

fields.name: pe
fields.comments:
Propagation model subtype for Hata,ECC33,SUI,COST231,Ericsson. 
1=Conservative, 
2=Average 
3=Optimistic.

fields.name: pm
fields.comments:
Propagation model. 
1=Irregular Terrain Model, 
2=Line of Sight (LOS), 
3=Hata, 
4=ECC33, 
5=SUI Microwave, 
6=COST231, 
7=Free space path loss, 
8=ITWOM, 
9=Ericsson9999, 
10=Plane earth loss, 
11=Egli. ITWOM is not available with engine=2 due to licensing.

fields.name: pol
fields.comments: Antenna polarisation. Either vertical 'v' or horizontal 'h'

fields.name: rad
fields.comments: Radius. Miles or KM depending on value of 'dis'

fields.name: red
fields.comments: Red threshold. For use only with custom RGB schema

fields.name: rel
fields.comments: ITM model required reliability as %

fields.name: res
fields.comments: Resolution in metres. 30=30m DSM (Global up to 60N), 60, 90. 1=1m LIDAR (subject to availability), 2=2m LIDAR...

fields.name: rxg
fields.comments: Receiver antenna gain in dBi

fields.name: rxh
fields.comments: Receiver height in metres

fields.name: rxs
fields.comments: Receiver sensitivity/threshold. Units determined according to 'out'

fields.name: ter
fields.comments: Terrain conductivity code. 15 = Rolling farmlan

fields.name: tlt
fields.comments: Antenna tilt from horizon in degrees. Up to the sky is negative, down toward the earth is positive.

fields.name: uid
fields.comments: Unique user identifier. Your CloudRF account id number.

fields.name: vbw
fields.comments: Custom antenna vertical beamwidth in degrees. For use only with ant=0

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.comments: verify ssl or not.

fields.name: clm
fields.comments:
Clutter mode. 
0=None/DSM only. 
1=My clutter.

fields.name: txg_tx
fields.comments: TX Transmitter antenna gain in dBi

fields.name: txg_rx
fields.comments: RX Transmitter antenna gain in dBi

fields.name: txw_tx
fields.comments: TX Transmitter RF power in Watts. 20dBm=0.1W

fields.name: txw_rx
fields.comments: RX Transmitter RF power in Watts. 20dBm=0.1W

fields.name: max_download_tasks
fields.comments: The maximum download tasks launched at the same time

fields.name: max_analyse_tasks
fields.comments: The maximum analyse tasks launched at the same time

fields.name: max_extrct_tasks
fields.comments: The maximum extracting  spatial data tasks launched at the same time
